main.name: Jacob Anderson
main.description: Hardware and Software engineering is my passion and my work exemplifies my endeavors into the world of web applications, embedded sofware, and embedded hardware. I look forward to a future full of discovery of new technology and implementation in order to further myself technologically and provide value to the world by offering my skillset to those in need
main.bio: Engineering and technology have always fascinated me. Throughout my career, I have tried to find interesting and creative ways to apply what I have learned in my software development career to the projects I have been involved in. I am a web applications software engineer professionally and an embedded hardware and software mad scientist by night.

resume.skillmessage: Java, JSF (Java Server Faces), JSF CDI, Primefaces, HTML, Spring, Spring Security, Spring Session, Spring Data Redis, Spring Boot, Hibernate ORM, Gradle, Maven, Selenium, TestNG, Javascript, API, Groovy, Spock, Create-React-App, ReactJS, Node.js Package Manager, NPM, Yarn, React Native, Flutter, C, C++, Arduino, New Relic, SonarQube, WhiteHat, Kubernetes, Docker

education.school: University of Nebraska-Lincoln, Peter Kiewit Institute
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
education.description: Embedded software and hardware design, advanced mathematics and statistical analysis, digital logic and technologies, design tools and techniques, documentation and maintenance

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Extensive Front-End, Back-End, API, and automated test application development and engineering, Serverless application scaling design inside a Kubernetes/Docker clustered environment, Seamless application deployment experience with continuous integration tools such as GitLab CI and Salt application configuration management, Automated build tools such as Gradle and Maven, React and Javascript front-end user interfaces design and API integration experience, Spring Framework, Spring Boot, Spring Security, Spring Session, Hibernate, JavaServer Faces, Primefaces Technologies, 3rd-Party Application Programming Interface (API) Integration and Implementation, GenSwagger API documentation, Selenium WebDriver and TestNG Automation Test Case Development applied to Java and React application front-end interfaces to ensure high quality user experiences, Docker Application Container + Kubernetes Server Deployment, Agile software development team member

work.title: Co-Founder, Embedded Systems Engineer
work.description: Printed circuit board design for automotive lighting applications, Microcontroller System Design and Implementation (C++ and C Programming Languages), Protocol Buffers and nanopb experience, Flutter Cross Platform mobile application integration to control embedded system hardware, Fusion 360 Electronics and Housing design integration, Product development and marketing, Customer product integration

work.title: Video Editor in Chief
work.description: Senior manager and active editor working within a team producing video captured at automotive events across the United States under the automotive industry's top media production company 1320Video, Author of original content media productions which have been featured on Yahoo.com, Yahoo Automotive, The Today Show, Top Gear and numerous other automotive channels on YouTube, Author of original content cumulatively amounting to over 50 million views on YouTube platform, Responsible for management of video scheduling and optimization working within a team of six editors, Innovation and collaboration using tools such as Slack messenger and Frame.io for video review and editing, Developed a video production scheduling, workflow and inventory system from the ground up using Trello, Frame.io and Google Sheets to optimize video production schedule, video editing/revision and monitoring, Responsible for researching, implementing, testing and maintaining editing software and productions tools on Apple OS X operating system. Implemented tools including Final Cut Pro X, CoreMelt SliceX, Frame.io, Trello, Zapier automation and After Effects and Photoshop, Optimization of content revenue strategy including placement of mid roll advertisements, correct timing of content relative to trending topics, overall channel revenue analysis and strategy adjustment.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Embedded software design, testing, and implementation, Developed a bootloaders for a Texas Instruments design used in automotive applications, Developed software for various Java and C software projects, Maintained and designed tools for inventory system based on feedback from manufacturing workers requirements and requests for improvements.

projects.description: Leveraged a 3rd party HTTP API using OAuth 2.0 security standard to generate and fetch security-related reports in PDF format. The company's portal application was tasked to generate a report instantaneously and await completion or setup scheduling of said report to run periodically.

projects.projectname: Automation Testing Project Design and Implementation
projects.description: Lead the design of automation project infrastructure and execution to perform Regression and Smoke testing the front-end Java and React portal application interfaces and unerlying functionality. I chose to use Google's Guice dependency injection framework to clean up source code and make commonly used properties readily accessible and easy for the testing team to understand.

projects.projectname: Control System Design with Configuration via Cross Platform Mobile Application
projects.description: Design of a printed circuit board used to drive LED lighting panels in a modular system design. The control board logs critical system transactions and errors that are reported back to the Flutter-based mobile application on either iOS or Android. The user is also able to customise the LED patterns and lighting preferences based on their input via the mobile application.

projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

projects.category: (offline now) A fighting gear company I started

projects.title: Smirkspace
projects.category: (MVP Only) A React and Meteor based chat University project.

testimonials.text: I have worked with Jacob for 3 years, and in that time, he has gone from learning web application development as a novice to an expert in many facets. He is eager to learn and determined to figure out how to make new technology work. He works well with others and contributes to the team without hesitation.
testimonials.user: Thomas McNally, Senior Software Engineer, NTT
